api_key.description: Imgix API key. Can also be sourced from IMGIX_API_KEY environment variable

date_deployed.description: Unix timestamp of when this Source was deployed.

deployment_status.description: Current deployment status. Possible values are deploying, deployed, disabled, and deleted.

enabled.description: Whether or not a Source is enabled and capable of serving traffic.

name.description: Source display name. Does not impact how images are served.

secure_url_token.description: Signing token used for securing images. Only present if deployment.secure_url_enabled is true.

type.description: Type of the resource. This will be always sources.

wait_for_deployed.description: Determines if Terraform should wait for deployed status after any change.

allows_upload.description: Whether imgix has the right permissions for this Source to upload to origin.

annotation.description: Any comment on the specific deployment.

cache_ttl_behavior.description: Policy to determine how the TTL on imgix images is set.

cache_ttl_error.description: TTL (in seconds) for any error image served when unable to fetch a file from origin.

cache_ttl_value.description: TTL (in seconds) for any error image served when unable to fetch a file from origin.

crossdomain_xml_enabled.description: Whether this Source should serve a Cross-Domain Policy file if requested.

custom_domains.description: Non-imgix.net domains you want to use to access your images. Custom domains must be unique across all Sources and must be valid domains.

default_params.description: Parameters that should be set on all requests to this Source.

image_error.description: Image URL imgix should serve instead when a request results in an error.

image_error_append_qs.description: Whether imgix should pass the parameters on the request that received an error to the URL described in image_error.

image_missing.description: Image URL imgix should serve instead when a request results in a missing image.

image_missing_append_qs.description: Whether imgix should pass the parameters on the request that resulted in a missing image to the URL described in image_missing.

imgix_subdomains.description: Subdomain you want to use on *.imgix.net to access your images.

s3_prefix.description: The folder prefix prepended to the image path before resolving the image in S3.

secure_url_enabled.description: Whether requests must be signed with the secure_url_token to be considered valid.

date_deployed.description: Unix timestamp of when this Source was deployed.

deployment_status.description: Current deployment status. Possible values are deploying, deployed, disabled, and deleted.

name.description: Source display name. Does not impact how images are served.

type.description: Type of the resource. This will be always sources.
